name: Archer
details:
This talent grants the Call for Fire passive power.
Increases by 10%: Crushing Damage Bonus|Piercing Damage Bonus|Slashing Damage Bonus|Crushing Damage Bonus Cap|Piercing Damage Bonus Cap|Slashing Bonus Damage Cap
You can now equip: Runic Composite Reflex Bows|Runic High Tension Compound Bows|Runic Recurve Bows|Runic Spellbound Longbows
